LAYOUT.NoConnectedToServers: You are currently not connected to any server.

HOME.NoServersAdded: You have no servers added yet. Add your first one using the button on the top right of this page. Also, check out the settings page to finish customizing WebConsole.

SETTINGS.ShowTimeOnConsoleLine: Show time on each console line
SETTINGS.RetrieveFullLogOnConnect: Fetch full log file after connecting. May affect performance for a few seconds or reach maximum browser memory when connecting to busy servers.
SETTINGS.BlurryUriHomepage: Blurry Server URI on homepage (Useful when using WebConsole in public spaces)
SETTINGS.MigrateDataDescription: Here you can export your saved servers and settings and import them in another WebConsole Client.
SETTINGS.CopyString: Copy the following string and paste it in your desired client:
SETTINGS.ImportFailed: Error occured importing. Check your exported string and try again.
SETTINGS.SelectLanguage: Select your preferred language to use with WebConsole

ADDEDITSERVER.Name: Server name
ADDEDITSERVER.NameNotEditable: Name not editable. To modify it, delete this server and create it again.
ADDEDITSERVER.PasswordPlaceholder: Leave blank to ask for password when connecting.
ADDEDITSERVER.SslEnabled: SSL is enabled on the plugin config
ADDEDITSERVER.SslEnabledMandatory: SSL is mandatory when using client over HTTPS connections due to browsers restrictions.
ADDEDITSERVER.RequiredOrTooLongField: This field is empty or exceeds 50 characters
ADDEDITSERVER.ServerAlreadyExist: A server with this name already exists

CONSOLE.CannotConnectDescription1: Please make sure that server is running, and that WebConsole port is open in both your firewall and router. You can use this
